text: Wilhelm Theodor H. Wulff (27 March 1892 â€“ 9 June 1979) was a German-Austrian astrologer and writer. He is best known for the 1973 book Zodiac and Swastika. The book tells about his time as an astrologer in Nazi Germany near the end of World War II. He was Heinrich Himmler's astrologer. ==References== Category:1892 births Category:1979 deaths Category:Astrologers Category:Austrian people of World War II Category:Austrian writers Category:German esotericists Category:German people of World War II Category:German writers
title: Wilhelm Wulff
